metadata.description: Azure region for all resources. Default: eastus2
Environment tag. Allowed values: dev, test, prod
Owner identifier for resource tagging (1-100 characters)
Resource group name (fixed per constitution). Default: rg-ai-core
Virtual WAN name. Default: vwan-ai-hub
Virtual Hub name. Default: hub-ai-eastus2
Virtual Hub address prefix (CIDR). Must not overlap with spoke VNets. Recommended spoke ranges: 10.1.0.0/16, 10.2.0.0/16, etc.
VPN Gateway name. Default: vpngw-ai-hub
P2S VPN Gateway scale units (1 unit = 500 Mbps, max 20 units = 10 Gbps). Default: 1
VPN Server Configuration name. Default: vpnconfig-ai-hub
VPN client address pool (CIDR notation). IP addresses assigned to VPN clients. Default: 172.16.0.0/24
Microsoft Entra ID Tenant ID for VPN authentication. Find at: Azure Portal > Microsoft Entra ID > Overview > Tenant ID. REQUIRED: Replace with your tenant ID.
Azure VPN Client Application ID (fixed for Azure VPN). Default: 41b23e61-6c1e-4545-b367-cd054e0ed4b4
Microsoft Entra ID Issuer URL. Replace YOUR_ENTRA_TENANT_ID with your tenant ID. Format: https://sts.windows.net/{tenantId}/
Deployment method tag. Default: manual
Additional custom tags (optional). Example: {"project": "AI-Lab", "costCenter": "Engineering"}
Shared services VNet name. Default: vnet-ai-shared
Shared services VNet address prefix (CIDR). Default: 10.1.0.0/24. Must not overlap with vHub (10.0.0.0/16) or VPN clients (172.16.0.0/24).
DNS Private Resolver name. Default: dnsr-ai-shared
DNS resolver inbound subnet CIDR (within shared VNet address space). Default: 10.1.0.64/27
